alert.note: Alert for La Porte; St. Joseph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 9:50PM EDT until March 31 at 10:30PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM EDT/930 PM CDT/ FOR SOUTHWESTERN ST. JOSEPH AND CENTRAL LA PORTE COUNTIES... At 950 PM EDT/850 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from La Porte to near La Crosse, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... La Porte, Westville, Walkerton, North Liberty, Kingsford Heights, Wanatah, Hanna, Kingsbury, Byron, Thomaston, South Center, Pinhook, Salem Heights, Fish Lake, South Wanatah, Tracy, Stillwell, Union Mills, Haskell and Pinola. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT/200 AM CDT/ for north central and northwestern Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
